author: Hey it's Camden

text:
As I go on remembering the trailers and such from this game, I realize that this song was used in some of the trailers, as well, making this the iconic song of Super Mario Galaxy. When you hear this song, even without being told what it is you instantly know that this is Super Mario Galaxy.

Great song.

text: galaxy has such an..EPIC soundtrack. It's not  cheesy as i excpected to be in a mario's game; it's fresh, epic but never gloomy, it always make you..happy and pumped up i guess. i had thrills at 1:30 while jumping with mario and doing awsome shit in the space. Man,this game is just so fucking pefect. never had so much fun in YEARS. Ans yes, the soundtrack is one of the best of the decade.
